item.description:
The first meeting will be an organizational meeting where we discuss the BosWebCMS group charter, gather objectives, and establish a schedule for presentations.

We will also discuss possible group support mechanisms for the group to do interesting things "away from meetings", i.e., using a portal/CMS/Community System to support the group itself. I am sure there will be no shortage of ideas on ways to do this, or opinions on which system(s) to use !!

Be prepared....this group will be a lot of fun!!

group.name: The Web Content Management Systems Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Web Content Management Systems March Meetup
